extendedInfo.description: Your Android can now feed you. No, it hasnât learned to cook. (What, are you in a hurry for the robot takeover?) But you wonât have to either, thanks to the free, easy-to-use Eat24 Order Delivery & Takeout app.Order food delivery from over 25,000 restaurants in 1,000+ cities, with more being added each day. Search from wherever you are, or wherever youâre going to be when youâre ready to eat. The Eat24 app remembers your preferences, which saves you time, and gives you coupons on a regular basis, which saves you money.Features:- With Eat24 Notes you can take a picture of a dish, add a Note, and remind yourself to order/not order an item again (Because hunger affects memory in mysterious ways). Notes also appear on restaurant menus to help us all make good future food (life) decisions.- Use your smartphone camera for adult purposes: picking up the tab. Powered by Card.io the Eat24 app lets you scan your credit card with one tap. No expensive add-ons. No unruly cords. No dongles. (Although we do love saying the word dongle, so you can still use a dongle if you want. Dongle.) Just point your phoneâs camera at your credit card to scan and securely store the info.- Don't like credit cards? Pay for your food with PayPal right from the app. No more fidgeting with your wallet. Just tap and pay.- Search for specific cuisines, restaurants...even particular dishes.- Want to pick something up on the way home? Order in advance, and the Eat24 app will have it waiting. (Well, really the restaurant will, but you get the idea.)- Like to play favorites? We understand completely (Mom always liked us best.) The Eat24 app lets you save your favorite restaurants so you can find them more easily next time.- Do you enjoy entering your credit card numbers over and over again? Thatâs a rhetorical question. No one likes that, which is why the Eat24 app stores your payment information for you.- Backed by 24/7 Live Support, this app lets you chat with a real person about your Eat24 order. No robots, we promise. It's not that we don't trust robots. Well, actually, no. We don't trust them. Except for you, Android. We love you.- Easy reordering for less thinking, and more enjoying.-Tweet Your Meal, because everyone knows that if you didnât tweet about it, it didnât actually happen.- Cash back for future orders through CashCoupon rewards system.- Exclusive offers and content through our Eat24 VIP program.Best of all, once your orderâs in, Eat 24 handles every aspect of the delivery experience. Which means no more screwed-up orders. No more wondering where the delivery driver is. Just the ability to take back a few precious minutes in your day and enjoy. Something not quite right? Hit up our 24/7 Live Support within the app and chat with a real human being about any issue or question you may have. Weâll make things right.Important:Our app is pretty laid back and doesnât ask for much, but it does need your permission for a few things.- Camera Permissions:We added a sweet feature that allows you to scan your credit card to pay your bill. This feature requires access to your camera, and it won't take any pictures unless you ask it to.- Accounts Permissions:The app needs your permission to access accounts so we can send you coupons, exclusive deals and the occasional love note. No bootie calls, we promise.- Global Settings Permissions:The customer support live chat feature requires that we temporarily modify your settings so your phone wonât doze off while in the middle of an important chat about your order.'Til we eat againâ¦Love,Eat24Hours

reviews.title: Nice not to have to call
reviews.comment: Bunch of restaurants but could be a few more. Easy app to use.
reviews.author: Nick Bennett

reviews.title: I heart Eat24!
reviews.comment: What a yummy app! So easy, convenient and wonderful. I will never go hungry again:)
reviews.author: Whitney Deutsch

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Good options but need to expand to deliver from new places,like _ tuk tuk tai in Berkeley there open till 12am also need some taco trucks and or more locations. But besides that badass app
reviews.author: George Marquez

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Love it. Just wish more places delivered to my house but the app is awesome.  Good service, good customer support and coupons every weekend! :) worth the download
reviews.author: sheena c

reviews.title: Great app, no restaurants.
reviews.comment: App is smooth and polished. Great concept and easy to use. Only one restaurant near  me though.
reviews.author: David Morehead

reviews.title: Distance
reviews.comment: You need to be able to set the distance further than 5 miles I know there are places that will deliver to my house outside of the 5 miles limit but I cant use your app to order from them because im outside of the 5 mile area
reviews.author: Will Clawson

reviews.title: Best app ever!!!
reviews.comment: This app makes everything convenient and is super easy to use...weve even used it to find places to eat when were out of town...awesome app!! Cant live with out it...
reviews.author: Cat sherburne

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app I do security. So its amazing having an app that helps me find food lol
reviews.author: Angelica Estrada

reviews.title: G S3
reviews.comment: Freezes every time I select an item, even after reinstall. Hello, GrubHub, except it only allows you to order from one restaurant within a certain time frame.
reviews.author: Lan Pham

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: This app works great. The restaurants response quickly and accurately.  Thank you!!!
reviews.author: Rex M

reviews.title: Super Convenient
reviews.comment: No matter if you are on your way home or trying to find the meal of the day eat 24 is perfect. You can find all the restaurants near you and sort them however you choose. If you want the cheapest delivery tgey will show you your options. Every menu item has a brief description and price and gives you the option to add any extras you would like. Eat 24 is the perfect app for the great food seekers.
reviews.author: Destini Wilson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I use it whenever I\'m in a new town traveling. Great job!
reviews.author: Orlando Green

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The chat feature it\'s  really handy
reviews.author: Dennis Thomas

reviews.title: Used the app for the first time today and its working beautifully.
reviews.comment: So awesome!
reviews.author: Bambie Parker

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I just wish ALL food services were on it and the radius could be expanded to 20. Texas is big. People don\'t mind driving.
reviews.author: Rick Wormwood

reviews.comment: It was easy to use & it was delivery fast. I would use it again.
reviews.author: Tawanda Graves

reviews.title: Good idea. Needs more support
reviews.comment: Just needs more participating restaurants. I can only find 4-5 places to eat in a 30 mile radius.
reviews.author: Damir Hurtic

reviews.title: Easiest way to get food
reviews.comment: Great app with full menu of local restaurants that delivery. Click, click, order, pay with credit card or PayPal, including tip. Remembers previous things you\'ve ordered so you don\'t have to. If the order gets lost, tell them using the app, and they\'ll find it for you. Great service for anyone who like to get food delivered.
reviews.author: Jim MacLeod

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app. Well designed. Easy to use and consistent between restaurants. One suggestion to developers, use local (in memory or persistent in sql) storage to track shopping cart so it doesn\'t take so long to load.
reviews.author: Matthew Morrissette

reviews.title: Amazing but confusing.
reviews.comment: Pretty awesome for the fact that it finds restaurants I never knew were around me and I can order right from my phone. Though it is generally helpful, it is not as user friendly as I would like
reviews.author: Rachel Pearson
